original_text:
This was for the sins of her prophets
    and the iniquities of her priests,
who shed in the midst of her
    the blood of the righteous.
korean_text: 그의 선지자들의 죄들과 제사장들의 죄악들 때문이니 그들이 성읍 안에서 의인들의 피를 흘렸도다

sentences.original_text: This was for the sins of her prophets
and the iniquities of her priests
who shed in the midst of her
